name: RUSH - Endless Traffic Game
description:
Tap to make objects move faster.

Tap again to slow them down.

Avoid a collision… or it’s game over!

Can you handle the RUSH?

• FREE!
• Endless game-play
• Simple, one-finger controls, play with one hand!
• All of your progress is saved in the cloud
• Game Center Leaderboard and Achievements

MORE CHARACTERS AND GAME MODES COMING SOON!
